title: Apple’s security is strong, but this $16 upgrade makes it a beast
content:
Macworld

If you want to double down on your privacy without losing the Apple experience you love, the AdGuard Family Plan is the easy $16 upgrade when you use code FAMPLAN at checkout.

You can block ads, trackers, malicious sites, and more on up to 9 devices, including Macs, iPhones, iPads, and yes, even your PCs and Android devices, for life.

AdGuard works across Safari and your favorite apps, blocking all types of intrusive content before it loads. It also shields your data from trackers, filters adult content with parental controls, and protects against malware and phishing links — all without bogging down your system.

Whether you’re browsing, shopping, or streaming, AdGuard runs in the background to provide a smoother and more private experience. Allowing for device control without compromising performance or user experience.
